overview:
Evan Reiser is a entrepenuer and software engineer. Previously he was the Co-Founder of Bloomspot, and currently helps run a advertising optimization startup: AdStack.

In January, 2011, Evan founded a advertising technology startup called AdStack. AdStack is a real-time A/B testing platform for email. AdStack tests email content in real-time, showing and shows the best content to the appropriate people in order to get the most clicks, conversions & purchases.

Previously, Evan was the Co-Founder at BloomSpot.com, a venture backed, luxury flash sales business based in San Francisco. Evan primarily focuses on cost effective user acquisition and core product development.

Before working in the group buying space, Evan was the CEO of GamerNook.com, a gaming focused social networking site used by over 100k+ users, overseeing business development, sales and engineering.

Prior to GamerNook.com Evan was employed at Capital IQ, a division of Standard and Poorâ€™s. Evan worked as one of four software engineers on the Screening & Analytics team that helped to design and develop the billion dollar Screening Technology used by over 4000 client firms.

Before working at Capital IQ, he worked for Eastman Kodak doing Research and Development in Artificial Intelligence and Multi-Agent Systems; clients included various intelligence agencies in Great Britain as well as the Royal Navy and the Royal Air-force.

Evan holds a Bachelors of Science in Computer Systems Engineering from Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute where he specialized in Computer Systems Design, Database Systems, and Web Development.
